title: One in 12 secondary pupils put in isolation rooms at least once a week, study finds
summary: A study by Manchester researchers reveals that children with special educational needs are more than twice as likely to face isolation in schools. This highlights potential inequalities and challenges in supporting these students adequately. The findings raise concerns about the impact of isolation on their education and well-being.

title: Rachel Roddy’s recipe for leftover polenta biscuits | A kitchen in Rome
summary: A new snack has emerged, combining elements of a biscuit, flapjack, and bread pudding. This unique treat is recommended to be savored alongside a hot beverage. Its comforting flavors make it an ideal pairing for cozy moments.

title: UK campaigners launch bill to give nature legal rights
summary: A private member's bill, supported by Chris Packham and Natalie Bennett, aims to establish a duty of care for both government and businesses. The legislation seeks to hold these entities accountable for their environmental and social responsibilities. This initiative reflects growing concerns about sustainable practices and corporate accountability.
